title: Recall Notification Report 086-2014 (Hickory Smoked Sliced Bacon)
summary: WASHINGTON, December 22, 2014 Abe's Finest Meats, a Palatka, Fla. establishment, is recalling approximately 80,050 pounds of hickory smoked sliced bacon products due to misbranding, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The following items, produced on various dates...
impacted_products: 10-lb. bulk frozen packages of “CEDAR CREEK HICKORY SMOKED SLICED BACON.”
